name: A Night to Survive
description:
Three VS Zombies is a game full of action, shooting and adventure. This game contains a small story in which you will have to survive the zombie attacks, escaping a mysterious forest and rescue your friend. After finishing the story you will unlock the survival mode, where you will test your survival skills and overcome all waves with your friend. ¡Enjoy it!

You want to donate to help in the development of this game? Visit my blog and donate what you want ;D

Blog: https://jlgamex.blogspot.com/

Controls:

W, S, D, A : Movement.

H: Go to Main Menu.

1,2,3: Switch weapon.

Space: Pause.

Mouse: Shoot.
